S piste še na tržnico, to je mégane R. S.
Francoski jekleni konjički z oznako renault sport prinašajo inženirsko znanje iz formule ena na mestne ulice; mégane R. S. bi lahko mirno poimenovali tudi družinski dirkalnik.
06 Nov 2019, 18:35 by Blaž Kondža



Potniki na zadnjih sedežih imajo svoja vrata, zato je avtomobil uporaben tudi za družinski vsakdanjik.



Vozniško okolje je športno urejeno, od športnega volana, aluminijastih stopalk do školjkastih sedežev.



Mégane R. S. stane od 30.040 evrov naprej; testna različica s športnim paketom cup in bogatejšo opremo stane 38.520 evrov. Fotografije: Blaž Kondža



Zunanjost je dirkaško obarvana, vključno s sredinsko postavljeno izpušno cevjo in nizkopresečnimi pnevmatikami.


Ob omembi mégana najprej pomislimo na petvratno kombilimuzino golfovega razreda. Ko pa mu dodamo kratico R. S., dobimo visoko zmogljiv avtomobil, ki se resno spogleduje z dirkališčem. Hkrati lahko z njim obiščemo tržnico in kupimo vse za nedeljsko kosilo.


Potniki na zadnjih sedežih imajo svoja vrata, zato je avtomobil uporaben tudi za družinski vsakdanjik.

Seveda bo pri slednjem udobje malček trpelo, saj je podvozje izvedenk R. S. – še posebno če naročimo paket CUP, kakršnega je imel tudi naš testni mégane – športno čvrsto. Tudi sprednja školjkasta sedeža, odeta v alkantaro, sta zasnovana z mislijo na šport in hitro vožnjo skozi ovinke. To pomeni, da na eni strani dajeta odličen bočni oprijem, na drugi pa rahlo otežita vstopanje v avtomobil zaradi visokega roba na sedalu. 
Volk v ovčji preobleki
Notranjost športnega mégana se skoraj ne razlikuje od običajne izvedenke. Izjema so okrasni elementi R. S., že omenjena športna sedeža in v alkantaro odet športni volan. Zunanjost megana R. S. pa je drugačna, vsekakor bolj mišičasta.


Zunanjost je dirkaško obarvana, vključno s sredinsko postavljeno izpušno cevjo in nizkopresečnimi pnevmatikami.

Da imamo opraviti s klenim športnikom, odkrivajo tudi posebej oblikovane sprednje dnevne luči, ki spominjajo na ciljno zastavico. Ko že omenjam dnevne luči, te gorijo tako spredaj kot zadaj. Žarometi so v LED-tehniki in so me navdušili z osvetlitvijo ceste pred avtomobilom. Če bi bili prilagodljive sorte, bi bili še boljši. 
Srce formule
Bistvo mégana R. S. sta že omenjeno športno podvozje in turbobencinski 1,8-litrski štirivaljnik z neposrednim vbrizgom goriva. Agregat razvije največjo moč 205 kilovatov oziroma 280 konjev pri 6000 vrt./min in največji navor 390 Nm v območju od 2400 do 4800 vrt./min. Turbopolnilnik z dvojno spiralo, ki je znan že iz predhodnika, izboljša navor pri nizkih vrtljajih. Testni mégane je bil opremljen s 6-stopenjskim ročnim menjalnikom, od katerega pa sem pričakoval natančnejše prestavljanje.


Vozniško okolje je športno urejeno, od športnega volana, aluminijastih stopalk do školjkastih sedežev.

Sprašujem se, ali niso bili za to morebiti krivi ostrejši testni kilometri.Za doplačilo 1700 evrov si lahko omislimo samodejni menjalnik z dvema sklopkama EDC, ki omogoči tudi funkcijo nadzorovanega starta z mesta, t. i. launch control. Dodajmo še, da obstaja tudi močnejša verzija mégana R. S., ki zmore okroglih 300 konjskih moči.A prepričan sem, da bo tudi šibkejša omogočila izdaten odmerek adrenalina – seveda na dirkališču, kjer se zmogljivosti te oranžne strele prav izrazijo. V prometu se namreč kaj hitro zgodi, da digitalni merilnik hitrosti seže prek dovoljenega. 
Štirikolesno krmiljenje
Podvozje testnega avtomobila je prava inženirska poslastica, nadgrajena s štirikolesnim krmiljenjem 4control. Ta poskrbi, da se zadnji kolesi pri nižjih hitrostih zasukata v nasprotno smer kot prednji, pri velikih hitrostih pa se prednji in zadnji kolesni par zasukata v isto smer. Mejna hitrost zasuka je odvisna od izbranega voznega programa – v dirkalnem programu race je to 100 km/h, v preostalih pa 60. Rezultat je zelo natančno krmiljenje med hitro vožnjo in večja okretnost na parkirišču. Tu smo cenili tudi vzvratno kamero in parkirna tipala, saj je pogled nazaj zaradi zajetnega D-stebrička okrnjen.
5,8sekunde potrebuje do 100 km/h.
Že omenjeni paket cup vključuje podvozje cup, ki je prilagojeno za vožnjo po dirkališču in ima za 10 odstotkov trše blažilnike. Poleg njega prinaša še diferencial z delno mehansko zaporo in rdeče zavorne čeljusti brembo. Posebnost so tudi obese izvedenke R. S., kjer so blažilniki opremljeni s hidravličnimi blokadami hoda, ki izvirajo iz relija. Gre za blažilnik znotraj blažilnika, ki pomaga preprečevati učinek odboja in nihanja, s čimer se zagotovi optimalen nadzor stika med pnevmatiko in cesto.Renault mégane R. From the catwalk to the market, this is Mégane R.S.
French steel hobbies with the renault sport designation bring engineering knowledge from Formula One to the city streets; R. S. mégane could also be peacefully called a family race car.
06 Nov 2019, 17:35 by Blaž Kondža



Rear-seat passengers have their own doors, so the car is also useful for family life.



The driving environment is sporty, from the sports steering wheel, the aluminum feet to the shell seats.



Mégane R. S. costs from $ 30,040 onwards; the test version with a sports cup package and richer equipment costs € 38,520. Photos by Blaž Kondža



The exterior is race-colored, including a center-mounted exhaust pipe and low-profile tires.


When we mention the mégane, let us first think of a five-door golf class sedan. However, when added to the abbreviation R. S., we get a high-performance car that is seriously flirting with the racetrack. At the same time we can go to the market with him and buy everything for Sunday lunch.


Rear-seat passengers have their own doors, so the car is also useful for family life.

Of course, the latter will suffer from the toddler's comfort, since the R.S.'s chassis - especially when ordering a CUP package like our test mégane - is sporty. Also, the Alcantara-clad front shell seats are designed with sports in mind and fast cornering. This means they give excellent lateral grip on one side and make it slightly more difficult to get into the car due to the high edge of the seat.
A wolf in sheep's clothing
The interior of the sports mégane is almost indistinguishable from the usual version. An exception are the decorative elements of the R.S., the sports seats mentioned above and the sports steering wheel worn in the alkantaro. The exterior of the R. S. megana, however, is different, certainly more muscular.


The exterior is race-colored, including a center-mounted exhaust pipe and low-profile tires.

That we are dealing with a bow athlete is also discovering specially designed front daytime running lights that resemble a goal flag. Speaking of daytime lights, they burn both in the front and in the back. The headlamps are in LED technology and I was impressed by the lighting of the road in front of the car. If they were flexible varieties, they would be even better.
The heart of the formula
At the heart of the R. S. Megane are the sports chassis and turbocharged 1.8-liter four-cylinder direct-injection fuel already mentioned. The unit develops a maximum power of 205 kW or 280 horses at 6000 rpm and a maximum torque of 390 Nm in the range of 2400 to 4800 rpm. A twin-turbocharged turbocharger known from its predecessor improves torque at low revs. The test mégane was fitted with a 6-speed manual gearbox, which I expected to shift more precisely.


The driving environment is sporty, from the sports steering wheel, the aluminum feet to the shell seats.

I wonder if the test miles could have been to blame for that. For an extra $ 1700 we can think of an automatic dual-clutch EDC gearbox that also provides a controlled start from the seat, t. i. launch control. Let's also add that there is also a stronger version of the S.S. mégane capable of around 300 horsepower. But I am sure that the weaker one will also allow for a hefty dose of adrenaline - of course on the racetrack, where the capabilities of this orange lightning are right. In traffic, something happens quickly that the digital speedometer goes beyond what is allowed.
Four-wheel steering
The test car chassis is a true engineering treat, upgraded with 4control four-wheel steering. This ensures that the rear wheels rotate in the opposite direction at lower speeds than the front wheels, and at high speeds the front and rear wheel pairs rotate in the same direction. The speed limit depends on the selected driving program - 100 km / h in the race program and 60 in the rest. We also appreciated the rearview camera and parking sensors here, since the back view is reduced due to the bulky D-pillar.
It takes up to 100 km / h in 5.8 seconds.
The aforementioned cup package includes a cup chassis that is customized for racetrack driving and has 10 percent harder dampers. In addition, it comes with a differential with a partial mechanical lock and red brake calipers. Another special feature is the R.S. suspension brackets, where the dampers are equipped with hydraulic stroke locks originating from the rally. It is a damper inside the damper that helps to counteract the effects of reflection and oscillation, ensuring optimum control of contact between the tire and the road.
